遊.definition: to walk; to tour; to roam; to travel

遊人如織.definition: crowded with visitors; packed with tourists

遊刃有餘.definition: handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily

遊園.definition: to visit a park or garden

遊園會.definition: garden party; fete (held in a garden or park); carnival; fair

遊子.definition: person living or traveling far from home

遊學.definition: to study away from home or abroad (old)

遊山玩水.definition: to go on a scenic tour

遊惰.definition: to laze about without doing anything productive

遊戲機.definition: video game machine; video game console

遊戲設備.definition: gaming device; controller (for computer or console)

遊戲說.definition: theory of free play (in Kant's philosophy)

遊抏.definition: old variant of 遊玩|游玩[you2wan2]

遊春.definition: to go for a trip in spring

遊牧.definition: nomadic; to move about in search of pasture; to rove around as a nomad

遊獵.definition: to go on a hunting expedition

遊玩.definition: to amuse oneself; to have fun; to go sightseeing; to take a stroll

遊蕩.definition: to wander; to roam about; to loaf about; to be idle

遊藝團.definition: group of actors or acrobats at a fair; theatrical troupe

遊行.definition: to march; to parade; to demonstrate; procession; march; demonstration; to travel around; to roam

遊街.definition: to parade sb through the streets; to march or parade in the streets

遊街示眾.definition: to parade (a prisoner) through the streets

遊覽.definition: to go sightseeing; to tour; to visit; CL:次[ci4]

遊說.definition: to lobby; to campaign; to promote (an idea, a product); (old) to visit various rulers and promote one's political ideas (in the Warring States period)

遊走.definition: to wander about; to roam; to move back and forth between (government and academia, two or more countries etc); to flow through (a circuit, a network, the body); to skirt (the border of legality); (of a singer's voice) to move within its range; (of a stock price) to fluctuate within (a range)

遊逛.definition: to go sightseeing; to spend one's leisure time wandering around

遊離.definition: to disassociate; to drift away; to leave (a collective); free (component)
